HomePage.title: Create stories that come to life in seconds
HomePage.subtitle: Your imagination and AI come together to turn a few words into a magical story full of illustrations.
HomePage.step1Description: Upload a photo, create a magical version of yourself, your pet, or anyone you want ‚Äî and as many characters as you can imagine!
HomePage.step2Title: 2. Choose which character will appear in your story
HomePage.step2Description: Pick from your own characters or use Cuentia‚Äôs presets. Mix and match freely!
HomePage.step3Title: 3. Write key points and the learning objective
HomePage.step3Description: Let your imagination run wild! Add key plot points, a learning goal, and your personal touch. Add as many images as you want!
HomePage.step4Title: 4. Add final customization details to your book
HomePage.step4Description: Add a special dedication and a back cover image to make it even more unique.
HomePage.findStoriestitle: üåç Find more stories in your language here! üåç
HomePage.noStories: There are no stories in the community yet.
HomePage.faq1Answer: Upload several photos and our AI generates a cartoon character you can use in your stories.
HomePage.faq2Answer: Credits are Cuentia‚Äôs currency to generate stories and illustrations.
HomePage.faq3Question: Can I use the stories commercially?
HomePage.faq3Answer: Yes, with subscription plans you get usage rights, even commercially.
HomePage.faq4Question: How many credits to create a story?
HomePage.finalCtaDescription: Join Cuentia and start bringing your stories to life.

CreateStoryPage.createStoryDescription: Transform your imagination into an unforgettable story full of illustrations and magic, where every page comes to life with your own ideas and characters.
CreateStoryPage.storyTitlePlaceholder: The Mystery of the Enchanted Forest
CreateStoryPage.readerNameTooltip: Enter the reader's name to personalize the first page of the book
CreateStoryPage.charactersDescription: Choose up to 4 characters for your story. You can create your own!
CreateStoryPage.storyDetailsSubtitle: Add the final touches to make your story unique.
CreateStoryPage.languageTip: üí° Tip: We recommend writing the details in the same language you'll generate the story in, so the result is more natural and accurate.
CreateStoryPage.plotPointsLabel: Be creative! Describe what you want to happen in the story, the relationship between the characters, or the settings where the story takes place.
CreateStoryPage.plotPointsPlaceholder: Leo, who is the protagonist, goes on a trip with his grandmother Maria and meets a girl (Ana) who will become his best friend. The story should take place on a beach.
CreateStoryPage.learningObjectivePlaceholder: Ex: Teach Leo the importance of friendship and teamwork.
CreateStoryPage.imageCountLabel: How many images do you want to add to your story?
CreateStoryPage.initialPhraseLabel: Phrase at the beginning of the story
CreateStoryPage.initialPhrasePlaceholder: For my dear Leo, with all my love.
CreateStoryPage.finalPhraseLabel: Phrase at the end of the story
CreateStoryPage.finalPhrasePlaceholder: From your Mom, who loves you madly.
CreateStoryPage.backCoverImageLabel: Add an image on the back cover
CreateStoryPage.languageWarning: üéØ Make sure to write your story details in the same language you'll create the story in, so everything fits perfectly.
CreateStoryPage.illustrateStoryDescription: Fill in the details and let the magic do the rest.
CreateStoryPage.illustratePagesAlertDescription: Each page you choose to illustrate has an additional cost of 100 credits.
CreateStoryPage.pageTextPlaceholder: Write the text for page {number} here...
CreateStoryPage.authPopupTitle: ‚ú® Sign up to create your story! ‚ú®
CreateStoryPage.authPopupDescription: Join the magic! Create an account to start generating your own stories and unique characters.
CreateStoryPage.generatingPopupTitle: Oops! There's still a story in the oven üßÅ
CreateStoryPage.generatingPopupDescription: Wait a little bit and you'll be able to create the next one.
CreateStoryPage.insufficientCreditsDescription: You need {needed} credits to create this story, but you only have {available} left.
CreateStoryPage.configErrorDescription: The image selection doesn't have an associated webhook. Please select a valid option.
CreateStoryPage.storyGeneratingTitle: Your story is on its way!
CreateStoryPage.storyGeneratingDescription: Your story is being generated. You'll receive a notification when it's ready.
CreateStoryPage.illustrationGeneratingDescription: You'll receive a notification when it's ready.

learningObjectiveSuggestions.learningObjectiveSuggestion1: Teach the importance of caring for others
learningObjectiveSuggestions.learningObjectiveSuggestion3: Make the protagonist see that they are stronger than they think
learningObjectiveSuggestions.learningObjectiveSuggestion4: Discover that being different is something special
learningObjectiveSuggestions.learningObjectiveSuggestion5: Learn to express and understand emotions
learningObjectiveSuggestions.learningObjectiveSuggestion6: Teach to forgive and ask for forgiveness
learningObjectiveSuggestions.learningObjectiveSuggestion7: Learn that we all make mistakes and that's okay
learningObjectiveSuggestions.learningObjectiveSuggestion8: Understand the value of telling the truth
learningObjectiveSuggestions.learningObjectiveSuggestion9: Teach to respect others, regardless of their differences
learningObjectiveSuggestions.learningObjectiveSuggestion11: Learn to overcome the fear of...

CreateStoryPage.insufficientCreditsIllustrateDescription: You need {needed} credits to illustrate this story, but you only have {available} remaining.
CreateStoryPage.validationLearningObjectiveMaxLength: The learning objective cannot exceed 200 characters.
CreateStoryPage.validationImageCountRequired: You must select a number of images.
CreateStoryPage.validationPromptMaxLength: The key points cannot exceed 600 characters.
CreateStoryPage.validationCharactersMin: You must select at least one character.
CreateStoryPage.validationCharactersMax: You can select up to 4 characters.
CreateStoryPage.defaultDescription: Fill in the details and let the magic do the rest.
CreateStoryPage.validationIllustrateCharactersMin: You must select at least one character.
CreateStoryPage.validationIllustrateCharactersMax: You can select up to 4 characters.
CreateStoryPage.toastStoryGeneratingDescription: Your story is being generated. You will receive a notification when it is ready.
CreateStoryPage.toastIllustrationGeneratingDescription: You will receive a notification when it is ready.
CreateStoryPage.errorDocumentNotFound: The user document does not exist.
CreateStoryPage.errorStoryCreationFailed: Could not create the story document.
CreateStoryPage.importantCharacterNote: Important: The story must use only the selected characters. Do not add any additional characters.

PersonajesPage.pageDescription: Here live the characters that will bring your stories to life. Create new friends, yourself, or even your pet!
PersonajesPage.authCardTitle: Upload a photo of yourself, your pet, or anyone you want and create a unique character.
PersonajesPage.authCardSubtitle: üí´Sign up and let the magic begin! üí´
PersonajesPage.noCharactersTitle: You haven't created any characters yet
PersonajesPage.noCharactersDescription: Your story is waiting for its protagonist. Create the first one and let the magic begin!
PersonajesPage.noCategoryCharactersDescription: More characters ready for adventure will be available soon.
PersonajesPage.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the character "{characterName}" from your data.

ComunidadPage.pageDescription: Discover stories created by other dreamers like you. Get inspired, share, and let the magic of their tales transport you to new worlds.
ComunidadPage.errorDescription: There was a problem connecting to the database. Please try again later.
ComunidadPage.noStoriesTitle: No stories in this category yet
ComunidadPage.noStoriesDescription: Explore other languages or be the first to share!

PreciosPage.pageDescription: Choose the option that best suits your creative pace. More credits, more stories, more magic.
PreciosPage.creditPackDescription: Perfect for those who want to try Cuentia or use it without a monthly commitment.
PreciosPage.subscriptionAlert: Up to 40% more credits with the subscription model!
PreciosPage.subscriptionTitle: ‚ú® Subscribe and save on every credit
PreciosPage.subscriptionDescription: No strings attached, no risk: cancel anytime and enjoy secure payments with Stripe
PreciosPage.errorDescription: Could not connect to the database.
PreciosPage.paymentErrorDescription: There was a problem creating the payment session. Please try again.

CreditsInfoDialog.title: How do credits work?
CreditsInfoDialog.description1: Every time you create a story, your credits are used based on the type of creation you choose.
CreditsInfoDialog.description2: The most basic stories cost starting from 800 credits, and include text + personalized illustrations.
CreditsInfoDialog.description3: The more elements you add (more pages, more images, or narrated voice), the more credits you will need.

ProfileAvatarPickerDialog.title: Choose Your Profile Picture
ProfileAvatarPickerDialog.description: Select one of your created characters or one of our predefined characters as your avatar.

RegisterPage.title: Sign Up
RegisterPage.description: Create your account to start creating magical stories

LoginPage.title: Log In
LoginPage.description: Enter your email to access your account
LoginPage.verificationRequiredDescription: Please verify your email to log in.
LoginPage.loginErrorDescription: The credentials are incorrect. Please try again.

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Reset Password
ForgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ForgotPasswordPage.successDescription: Check your inbox to reset your password.
ForgotPasswordPage.errorDescription: An error occurred. Please try again.
ForgotPasswordPage.userNotFoundDescription: No account was found with that email address.

VerifyEmailPage.title: You're almost there! Verify your email
VerifyEmailPage.description: We have sent a verification link to your email address. Please click on the link to activate your account and log in.
VerifyEmailPage.afterVerification: Once verified, you will be able to access all Cuentia features.
VerifyEmailPage.noEmailText: Haven't received the email? Check your spam folder or contact us.

EjemplosPage.title: Gallery of Imagination
EjemplosPage.description: Explore the worlds created with Cuentia. Every story is a door to a new adventure or a new learning experience.

CharacterPickerDialog.title: Choose a Character
CharacterPickerDialog.description: Select a character for your story. Already chosen characters are disabled.

authPopup.title: ‚ú® Sign up to create your character! ‚ú®
authPopup.description: Join the magic! Create an account and start generating your own avatars for your stories.

generationModal.loadingDescription: We are bringing your character to life. Please do not leave the page.

page.title: Create Your Personalized Avatar
page.description: Upload a few photos and let artificial intelligence transform you, a loved one, or your pet into the protagonist of a story.

photos.title: 2. Upload Photos ({count}/4)
photos.description: Upload 2 to 4 photos where the character‚Äôs face and full body are clearly visible (person or animal). Make sure they are the only one in the image and that the photos are well lit.

errors.database: The database is unavailable. Please try again.
errors.insufficientPhotos: Please upload between 2 and 4 photos to generate the avatar.
errors.insufficientCredits: You need {cost} credits to create an avatar, but you only have {available} remaining.
errors.serverError: There was a problem contacting the server.
errors.noAvatarUrl: The server response did not include an avatar URL.
errors.photoLimitDescription: You can upload a maximum of 4 photos.

success.avatarSaved: The avatar "{name}" has been saved to your collection.

errors.loadError: Could not load the story. Please try again.
errors.notFoundDescription: We could not find the story you are looking for or the PDF is not available.

PerfilPage.noSubscription: You do not have an active subscription.
PerfilPage.paymentFailureDescription: There was a problem with your subscription payment. Please update your payment method.
PerfilPage.storiesDescription: Here you will find all your magical creations.

PerfilPage.noStoriesDescription: It's time to bring your first story to life!

PerfilPage.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. "{storyTitle}" will be permanently deleted.

errors.loadError: Could not load the story. Please try again.
errors.notFoundDescription: We could not find the story you are looking for or the PDF is not yet available.

CharacterCustomizationDialog.title: Customize {characterName}
CharacterCustomizationDialog.description: Add specific visual details for this character just for this story.
CharacterCustomizationDialog.placeholder: e.g., Put warm clothing and a red cap on my character
CharacterCustomizationDialog.alert: Write the customization in the same language you are going to generate the story in.

success.title: Avatar updated!
success.description: Your profile picture has been changed successfully.
